queriesList.query: (((sum(kube_deployment_status_replicas{}) or vector(0)) + (sum(kube_statefulset_replicas{}) or vector(0)) + (sum(kube_daemonset_status_desired_number_scheduled{}) or vector(0))) - ((sum(kube_deployment_status_replicas_available{}) or vector(0)) + (sum(kube_statefulset_status_replicas{}) or vector(0)) + (sum(kube_daemonset_status_number_ready{}) or vector(0)))) / ((sum(kube_deployment_status_replicas{}) or vector(0)) + (sum(kube_statefulset_replicas{}) or vector(0)) + (sum(kube_daemonset_status_desired_number_scheduled{}) or vector(0))) * 100&duration=1m&step=5m
queriesList.name: Unavailable Replicas

queriesList.query: (sum(kube_deployment_status_replicas_available{}) or vector(0)) + (sum(kube_statefulset_status_replicas{}) or vector(0)) + (sum(kube_daemonset_status_number_ready{}) or vector(0))&duration=1h&step=5m
queriesList.name: Available (cluster)

queriesList.query: (sum(kube_deployment_status_replicas{}) or vector(0)) + (sum(kube_statefulset_replicas{}) or vector(0)) + (sum(kube_daemonset_status_desired_number_scheduled{}) or vector(0))&duration=1h&step=5m
queriesList.name: Total (cluster)
